issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: ResourceAdministrator Role Not Able To Admin Cloudformation Resources

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
*Assessment*

If the cloud administrator (admin user of {{eucalyptus}} account) deletes Cloudformation stacks present in other accounts, the resources associated with the stack are not deleted. 

# Create stack in non-{{eucalyptus}} account
*Stack in {{development-operations}} Account*
{code}
[root@g-05-06 ~]# euform-create-stack DBInternalELB --template-file cfn-internal-elb-test.json --region devops-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000441287616:stack/DBInternalELB/eeff8086-5699-459a-8ece-fa3807e79bf8
[root@g-05-06 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@
STACK	DBInternalELB	CREATE_COMPLETE		Elastic Load Balancing Test => MVP test for internal AWS::ElasticLoadBalancing::LoadBalancer resource on VPC	2016-07-16T14:01:16.089Z
OUTPUT	LoadBalancerId	DBIntern-LoadBalan-FNHLLDVQCDLL0
OUTPUT	LoadBalancerDNSName	internal-DBIntern-LoadBalan-FNHLLDVQCDLL0-000441287616.lb.a-27.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
OUTPUT	LoadBalancerSecurityGroupName	default
OUTPUT	LoadBalancerSecurityGroupOwnerAlias	000441287616
{code}
# {{DescribeStack}} using creds from {{eucalyptus}}/admin user
{code}
[root@g-05-06 ~]# euform-describe-stacks verbose --show-long
STACK	DBInternalELB	CREATE_COMPLETE		Elastic Load Balancing Test => MVP test for internal AWS::ElasticLoadBalancing::LoadBalancer resource on VPC	2016-07-16T14:01:16.089Z
arn:aws:cloudformation::000441287616:stack/DBInternalELB/eeff8086-5699-459a-8ece-fa3807e79bf8
None
OUTPUT	LoadBalancerId	DBIntern-LoadBalan-FNHLLDVQCDLL0
OUTPUT	LoadBalancerDNSName	internal-DBIntern-LoadBalan-FNHLLDVQCDLL0-000441287616.lb.a-27.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
OUTPUT	LoadBalancerSecurityGroupName	default
OUTPUT	LoadBalancerSecurityGroupOwnerAlias	000441287616
{code}
# {{DeleteStack}} using creds from {{eucalyptus}}/admin user
{code}
[root@g-05-06 ~]# euform-delete-stack arn:aws:cloudformation::000441287616:stack/DBInternalELB/eeff8086-5699-459a-8ece-fa3807e79bf8
{code}
# {{DescribeStack}} using creds from user in {{development-operations}} account to confirm the stack has been deleted
{code}
[root@g-05-06 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@
[root@g-05-06 ~]#
{code}
# {{DescribeInstances}} - passing verbose - using creds from {{eucalyptus}}/admin user and notice how the instance is still in {{pending}} state
{code}
[root@g-05-06 ~]# euca-describe-instances verbose
RESERVATION	r-c9411036	000366884601	default
INSTANCE	i-3a5e5d66	emi-57752bcb		euca-192-168-55-229.eucalyptus.internal	pending		0		m1.small	2016-07-16T14:17:47.254Z	black-dollar	monitoring-enabled		192.168.55.229	vpc-664456fe	subnet-017deaf1	instance-store					hvm		29366401-de6b-4931-a359-479e98ebf00a_black-dollar_1	sg-bee41522			arn:aws:iam::000366884601:instance-profile/internal/loadbalancer/loadbalancer-vm-000441287616-DBIntern-LoadBalan-FNHLLDVQCDLL0	x86_64
NETWORKINTERFACE	eni-0baa2db6	subnet-017deaf1	vpc-664456fe	000366884601	in-use	192.168.55.229		true
ATTACHMENT	eni-attach-5c85fea2	0	attached	2016-07-16T14:17:47.258Z	true
GROUP	sg-bee41522	default
PRIVATEIPADDRESS	192.168.55.229		primary
TAG	instance	i-3a5e5d66	euca:node	10.111.5.70
{code}

*Workaround*

In order to delete the resources, the cloud administrator needs to survey each service involved in the stack and delete the resources.
fields.summary: Stacks Deleted In Non-System Accounts by Cloud Admin Leave Behind Resources

comments.body: This could be a cloudformation, load balancing or ec2 issue. Did the stack events show that the load balancer was deleted? was the elb still present or only the related instance?  how long did the instance remain in the pending state?

Code Review Request :

branch : dev-mmunn1-EUCA-12581

diff :  git show --color 70fb50f6f521a7052ec07adf85b7c8ac9273be0f

Summary: Stacks Deleted In Non-System Accounts by Cloud Admin Leave Behind Resources

Solution: If the user is the "Eucalyptus Admin", pass the StackEntity userId into DeleteStackWorkflow

Unit test : described in comments,

[~mmunn1], not sure if this is the same situation as EUCA-12151 where the fix was not merged into maint-4.3 and security-4.3 branches, but the fix didn't resolve the issue.

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.3.1-0.25135.61.20161031git2ca359f.el7}}

*Steps*

# Deployed Eucalyptus 4.3.1 cloud - [hspencer-145|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint-4.3/145/]
# Created non-eucalyptus account
{code}
[root@e-36 ~]# euare-accountcreate -a development-operations -w > .euca/devops-admin.in
{code}
# Downloaded [Ubuntu Xenial cloud image|http://cloud-images.ubuntu.com/xenial/current/xenial-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.img], converted the image to raw format, then used {{euca-install-image}} to bundle, upload and register the image.
# Deployed stack using linked {{cfn-helper-scripts-waitcondition.json}} template:
{code}
[root@e-36 ~]# euform-create-stack CFNHelperScriptTest --template-file cfn-helper-scripts-waitcondition.json --parameter ImageId=emi-dfaf737f --parameter EndPoint=http://cloudformation.g-26-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --parameter KeyName=devops-admin --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region devops-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000749068337:stack/CFNHelperScriptTest/01889344-ab6e-4bce-9fa9-09fee1b16be0

[root@e-36 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@
STACK	CFNHelperScriptTest	CREATE_COMPLETE		Cloudformation WaitCondition Example => Run instance with userdata to install Nginx Web Server in security group on VPC	2016-11-03T00:08:54.641Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-dfaf737f
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.g-26-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	KeyName		devops-admin
OUTPUT	InstanceId	i-75c4e1c0
OUTPUT	AZ	trap-or-die-three
OUTPUT	PublicIP	10.116.156.244
{code}
# Delete stack using cloud administrator credentials
{code}
[root@e-36 ~]# euform-describe-stacks verbose --region euca-admin@ --show-long
STACK	euca-internal-imaging-service	CREATE_COMPLETE		Imaging worker stack	2016-11-02T15:43:02.580Z
arn:aws:cloudformation::000384265340:stack/euca-internal-imaging-service/0baf4777-c322-4b97-887c-05570e7cedd8
None

PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-7d5a22b6
PARAMETER	InitScript
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	KeyName
PARAMETER	NtpServer
PARAMETER	LogServer
PARAMETER	LogServerPort		514
PARAMETER	ImagingServiceUrl		imaging.g-26-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
PARAMETER	EuareServiceUrl		euare.g-26-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
PARAMETER	ComputeServiceUrl		compute.g-26-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
PARAMETER	VmExpirationDays		180
PARAMETER	AvailabilityZones		trap-or-die-three
PARAMETER	NumberOfWorkers		1
STACK	CFNHelperScriptTest	CREATE_COMPLETE		Cloudformation WaitCondition Example => Run instance with userdata to install Nginx Web Server in security group on VPC	2016-11-03T00:08:54.641Z
arn:aws:cloudformation::000749068337:stack/CFNHelperScriptTest/01889344-ab6e-4bce-9fa9-09fee1b16be0
None
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-dfaf737f
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.g-26-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	KeyName		devops-admin
OUTPUT	InstanceId	i-75c4e1c0
OUTPUT	AZ	trap-or-die-three
OUTPUT	PublicIP	10.116.156.244
[root@e-36 ~]# euform-delete-stack arn:aws:cloudformation::000749068337:stack/CFNHelperScriptTest/01889344-ab6e-4bce-9fa9-09fee1b16be0 --region euca-admin@
[root@e-36 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@
STACK	CFNHelperScriptTest	DELETE_IN_PROGRESS	User Initiated	Cloudformation WaitCondition Example => Run instance with userdata to install Nginx Web Server in security group on VPC	2016-11-03T00:08:54.641Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-dfaf737f
PARAMETER	EndPoint		http://cloudformation.g-26-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium

OUTPUT	AZ	trap-or-die-three
OUTPUT	PublicIP	10.116.156.244
{code}
# Confirm stack has been deleted:
{code}
[root@e-36 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@
[root@e-36 ~]#
{code}
# Confirm resources have been deleted (failed):
{code}
[root@e-36 ~]# euca-describe-instances --region devops-admin@
RESERVATION	r-ddab6eac	000749068337	CFNHelperScriptTest-NginxSecurityGroup-6QEBX0O2BXEN1
INSTANCE	i-75c4e1c0	emi-dfaf737f	euca-10-116-156-244.eucalyptus.g-26-01.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-0-0-181.eucalyptus.internal	running	devops-admin	0		m1.medium	2016-11-03T00:09:08.941Z	trap-or-die-three				monitoring-disabled	10.116.156.244	10.0.0.181	vpc-f8543f00	subnet-a6577b94	instance-store					hvm			sg-0965e0b9			arn:aws:iam::000749068337:instance-profile/CFNHelperScriptTest-DefaultInstanceProfile-CIBNV2DPWEAV8	x86_64

TAG	instance	i-75c4e1c0	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	CFNHelperScriptTest

[root@e-36 ~]# euca-describe-vpcs --region devops-admin@
VPC	vpc-baf8ab9e	available	172.31.0.0/16	dopt-a57cc1d1	default	true

[~hspencer] Same thing they are not in 3.1  I will merge them today.
[~hspencer] I merged the fix into both maint-4.3 and security-4.3s

*Eucalyptus Version*

{{4.3.1-0.25149.70.20161107git7d68652.el7}}

*Steps*

# Set up Eucalyptus 4.3.1 cloud with VPC - [hspencer-164|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Maint-4.3/164/]
# Create non-eucalyptus account
{code}
[root@g-22-05 ~]# euare-accountcreate -a development-operations -w > .euca/devops-admin.ini
[root@g-22-05 ~]# ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "Development Operations - Admin Keypair"
[root@g-22-05 ~]# euca-import-keypair -f devops-admin-pk.pub devops-admin --region devops-admin@
KEYPAIR	devops-admin	8d:20:b4:6d:dc:3b:0c:4b:39:34:62:1d:ad:cd:82:17
{code}
# Bundle, upload and register Ubuntu Xenial Cloud Image
# Create stack using linked {{cfn-elb-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json}} template:
{code}
[root@g-22-05 ~]# euform-validate-template --template-file cfn-elb-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json --region devops-admin@
DESCRIPTION	CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack with ELB access logging in Eucalyptus VPC
PARAMETER	ImageId	false		Ubuntu Image id
PARAMETER	KeyName	false		Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instances
PARAMETER	InstanceType	false	m1.medium	Type of EC2 instance to launch.
PARAMETER	MinSize	false	2	Minimum number of EC2 instances.
PARAMETER	MaxSize	false	4	Maximum number of EC2 instances.
[root@g-22-05 ~]# euform-create-stack NginxELBStack --template-file cfn-elb-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json --parameter ImageId=emi-9398a965 --parameter KeyName=devops-admin --parameter MaxSize=2 --region devops-admin@
arn:aws:cloudformation::000050199155:stack/NginxELBStack/209a5e95-c39a-4142-963a-ff7620165b27

[root@g-22-05 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@

PARAMETER	KeyName		devops-admin
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		2

# List stacks using eucalyptus/admin user:

STACK	NginxELBStack	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack with ELB access logging in Eucalyptus VPC	2016-11-08T22:05:31.009Z
